name: list_of_districts
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool booking_com.
Tool description: Find all hotels, view prices, photos of the hotels, reviews. Find car rental deals. **Site:** booking.com **Support**:  [tipsters@rapi.one](mailto:tipsters@rapi.one) / t.me/api_tipsters
API description: Fetches a list of districts from Booking.com where hotels are available, based on various optional filters.

country.description: The country associated with the district.

city_id.description: The city ID associated with the district.

page.description: The page number for pagination purposes.
